The Krull Empire. It welcomes you.
It is time to speak. We will hear you.
Your purpose here. We ask of it.
Our time is short. State your purpose.
This serves no purpose. What do you want?
We have no time for you. Be quick.
The Krull. We do not like you.
Our purpose. Do not distract us from it.
Your luck. It keeps us from destroying you.
Why does it speak at us?
We do not want to hear its words.
Got no time for chit chat.
Don't really want to have this conversation.
We are glad to receive your transmission.
The Sneeb are glad for their allies.
The Krull Empire. It honours its friends.
Our friend. We are glad to see you.
Our warmest greetings. We offer them.
Your purpose. May we help with it?
We are pleased by its presence.
Good to hear a friendly voice.
